div.p: RIPPING OFF THE MEASURE TAXPAYER, AS YOU KNOW THE
NATION OWES $17 TRILLION DISASTER.
ONE OF THE REASONS FOR THAT IS THE INCREDIBLE DEBT THAT
THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT RUNS UP BY WASTING MONEY.
HERE IS ANGOOD EXAMPLE. THERE IS A PROGRAM CALLED
LIFELINE THAT CAUSES $2.2 BILLION A YEAR.
THAT ENTITLEMENT PROVIDES A DISCOUNT ON PHONE SERVICE
FOR LOW INCOME AMERICANS. ALSO SOME PHONE COMPANIES
GIVE AWAY TELEPHONES AS PART OF THE LIFELINE
SITUATION. IN 2008 THE LIFETIME BUDGET
WAS 822 MILLION BUCKS. LAST YEAR THAT HAD RISEN TO
AN ASTOUNDING 2.2 BILLION UNDER THE OBAMA
ADMINISTRATION. RECENTLY A WHISTLEBLOWER
GROUP CALLED PROJECT VERTOSE TRUTH IN LATIN.
ONE OF THE UNDERCOVER STOPS PHILADELPHIA.

THEY GO GET $40.'
>> Bill: 2.2 BILLION A LOT OF LAUGHS.
WITH US JAMES O'KEEFE THE PROJECT OF VERTOSE.

BILL. >> Bill: THE GOVERNMENT
